snippet: Ryan Seacrest has bought a controlling stake in the Civic Entertainment Group to try to build a diversified media company.
abstract: Brian Stelter Advertising column; Ryan Seacrest buys controlling stake in 12-year-old marketing agency Civic Entertainment Group in an effort to build a diversified media company on top of his jobs and marketing deals.
lead_paragraph: Ryan Seacrest has bought a controlling stake in the Civic Entertainment Group to try to build a diversified media company.

headline.seo: Seacrest Buys Marketing Agency to Expand Reach
headline.main: TV Host Buys Marketing Agency to Expand His Reach
headline.print_headline: TV Host Buys Marketing Agency To Expand His Reach
